data.title: Wardak, AF Climate Zone, Monthly Weather Averages and Historical Data
data.meta_description: Climate of Wardak, Afghanistan. Information regarding Wardak climate zones and historical climate data including temperature and precipitation.
data.text:
Wardak, Afghanistan Climate

Weather: 24.48°C/76.06°F, Wind SW at 4.89 km/h, 15% Humidity, 0% Chance of rain

Wardak Climate Summary

Located at an elevation of 2997.92 meters (9835.7 feet) above sea level, Wardak has a Humid continental, dry warm summer climate (Classification: Dsb). The city’s yearly temperature is 4.3ºC (39.74ºF) and it is -11.4% lower than Afghanistan’s averages. Wardak typically receives about 18.92 millimeters (0.74 inches) of precipitation and has 54.29 rainy days (14.87% of the time) annually.
